short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will run through 5-4-3-2-1 star reviews (all available pages), collect the reviews and save them to .csv file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will run through 5-4-3-2-1 star reviews (all available pages), collect the reviews and save them to .csv file. If "current format" is not specified - the reviews will be collected for all child variations. Otherwise the reviews will be collected based on the dropdown selection -either all variations, or specific variation only.
